vsParam: Lady Cuphea~ You want to see me?

Everyone, thanks for coming.
I've been expecting you all.

I've been trying to figure out how to help you,
so I prepared the "Fairy Spoon".

Yes, the "Fairy Spoon". Equip ingredients
in the "Trait Inheritance" during synthesis.

The traits of ingredients in the "Trait Inheritance" list
will be passed onto the synthesized items.
Good for you, [px], you figured that out so soon.

Lady Cuphea... I'm sorry~
But I can't follow you~

Me... Me neither...
Lady Cuphea, could you please elaborate it to us?

Hehe, all right.
Let me give you an example.

For instance, a "Green Apple" comes with
a trait of "Increase Damage".

But Peppermint, if that trait that comes with
a "Green Apples" will work as expected?
Um... No, I don't think so.

"Increase Damage"will only work when it comes with
attack items such as "unis" or "Puni Balls"...

So, what will happen if we combine the "Fairy Spoon"
and "Green Apple" while synthesizing "Puni Balls"♪

Um... The trait of "Increase Damage"
will be passed onto the "Puni Balls"?

Uh——! Isn't that impressive!? The item can inherit
"traits not included in the item" with the "Fairy Spoon"?

[px], hurry, confirm all the ingredients in your bag!
Maybe some ingredients are with powerful hidden traits!!

You're welcome, Peppermint.
Take care and welcome back.
